title: TokenMe.w
author: TokenMe.w
content: It is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: For your reminder: You shouldn't hire someone to shill on this forum. Their behavior is too easy to identify, and will ultimately damage your project's reputation.And especially, this forum also moderates posts in the spam category.

comments.author: TokenMe.w
comments.body: WOW thanks for the heads up

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 02:38:19 PMWOW thanks for the heads upSo now you know that shilling is a bad type of marketing, how come you still do not lock this thread or change the content of your post from looking to shilling manager to bounty manager or marketing manager.Checking your post history you have one crowdfunding project coming up and you think a shilling manager can help you raise funds but unfortunately, that's the type of marketing that will bust your goal, members of this forum can easily trace and tag your project if it employs shilling.You did not yet mention the name of the project but it looks like a pump and dump project because shilling and pump and dump go together.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.created_time: June 04, 2023, 12:09:52 AMLast edit: June 04, 2023, 12:28:23 AM by joniboini
comments.body: Aren't you looking for a bounty manager already? That should be a good option for marketing. You can't force managers to accept your proposal even if you pay them a lot of money if their credibility is at risk unless you want to hire someone with no reputation at all. It might be a good idea to introduce your project first. As far as I can remember, there are also marketing services if you want to promote your project on other media in the Services board, just need to search for them. I doubt any of them will accept mindless spam posts though.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Here is some of my past works, they have helped thousands of projects to go to daa moon!1- cool project.2- keeping a close eye on this.3- wow.4- I have been waiting my entire life for this.5- going to the moon.Now keep asking for bounties, campaigns etc is a huge helper, especially if we fake asking for translations, for dead or alive languages alike, moreover, posting with a few high rank alts will do miracles.I don't have a team but I can manage to work as a team, I will shill for you with 50 accounts, that would be $1000 per day, and I take at least a day's payment upfront, you can find my address in my profile, if you don't pay me in the next hour or so, I will hunt your project down and haunt your thread to under ground!Actually now that I think about it, since I'm an extortionist (don't even know how to spell it) You have to pay me $1000 just for letting me know about your request.ðŸ¤£

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 01:31:10 PMIt is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works What do you mean by shilling service? Shilling service is more sort of spamming service, and it will not help your project in the long term.If you are really interested to promote your service on this forum, then my recommendation is that first you should make and publish an ANN on the relevant section of the forum. Then you may start a signature campaign for your project. It will be sustainable marketing and your project will get good coverage.

comments.author: Zetfexboo59
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 01:31:10 PMIt is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works Your previous post says $400 per month for bounty manager and now you say $50 to $100 per day. Sounds fishy. Anyway, if it's $100 per day, I'm interested.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on June 04, 2023, 01:50:18 PMActually now that I think about it, since I'm an extortionist (don't even know how to spell it) You have to pay me $1000 just for letting me know about your request.ðŸ¤£ Add more $1000 to this, OP can run signature campaign for 4 weeks

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: Zetfexboo59 on June 05, 2023, 10:51:26 PMQuote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 01:31:10 PMIt is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works Your previous post says $400 per month for bounty manager and now you say $50 to $100 per day. Sounds fishy. Anyway, if it's $100 per day, I'm interested. Such people just post and never look back on the forum. The reason for this is that no one is willing to work with their scam services. For a moment think that will they pay anyone in advance to perform a shilling service ? No way, it's just a marketing stunt and when you contact them, they have their own terms and conditions.Quote from: Zoomic on June 08, 2023, 11:41:12 PMQuote from: digaran on June 04, 2023, 01:50:18 PMActually now that I think about it, since I'm an extortionist (don't even know how to spell it) You have to pay me $1000 just for letting me know about your request.ðŸ¤£ Add more $1000 to this, OP can run signature campaign for 4 weeks Â If OP had money, he should have opted for a better means to promote his business. But look like he is only interested in free advertisements and that too in a unethical manner like spamming / Shilling.

comments.author: Riyasteve
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 01:31:10 PMIt is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works Please contact us for services: info@blockchainappfactory.com

comments.author: smyslov
comments.body: Members prone to the word shilling here in this forum, if only you should change their wording to something more acceptable to the community, then we will have reputable members, promoters, and bounty managers applying to be their promoters, only dubious project and pump and dump token are using shilling they want to get into people's head by manipulating facts about their project.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: @OP if you're budgeting up to $100 per day. Why not just hire a marketing team that will do everything for you? I think that budget is enough to have at least a good marketing manager or a team that will work on your project and market it on platforms that you wanna get known. If you wanna hire someone that's gonna be shilling your project specifically in the forum, I doubt that you'll get one. Most of those that are doing it are likely to get avoided and ignored in discussions. Or if you're specific to campaigns, there could be some that will put their reputations on line but not as reputed as the one's that are known and existing here.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on June 03, 2023, 01:31:10 PMIt is difficult to find Services except you come on here. I am looking for a shilling manager for my project. Our offer depends on your team size and our payment is flexible $50 - $100 each 24 hours. We will pay advance before start of work every 24 hours. Dm me on bitcoin talk with existing works  Shilling within this forum can be identified quickly, and it will ruin your reputation. Also, the Shiller accounts may get neutral/negative tags for their spam in the forum. However, you may find the bounty campaign interesting. A bounty campaign is also shilling that can be done on various platforms, including Reddit, Youtube, Facebook and Twitter. There might be many more other channels. However, you must spend a lot of money to hire a bounty manager and bounty workers. Now I am curious what is your service/platform that needs shilling marketing. Isn't it good to spend some money on advertising and get some real exposure?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: smyslov on June 20, 2023, 09:54:12 AMMembers prone to the word shilling here in this forum, if only you should change their wording to something more acceptable to the community, then we will have reputable members, promoters, and bounty managers applying to be their promoters, only dubious project and pump and dump token are using shilling they want to get into people's head by manipulating facts about their project.Quote from: Learn Bitcoin on June 22, 2023, 11:42:19 AMHowever, you must spend a lot of money to hire a bounty manager and bounty workers. Now I am curious what is your service/platform that needs shilling marketing. Isn't it good to spend some money on advertising and get some real exposure? Well, it's forbidden here to shill any project here as they will be counted as spam. However, what do you think all the bounty managers are doing? Aren't they shilling for projects through Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms? They are doing the exact thigs but simply because they are doing it off forum, on one care. I'm sure OP is looking for that service here.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on June 22, 2023, 03:52:25 PMWell, it's forbidden here to shill any project here as they will be counted as spam. However, what do you think all the bounty managers are doing? Aren't they shilling for projects through Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms? They are doing the exact thigs but simply because they are doing it off forum, on one care. I'm sure OP is looking for that service here. Exactly, that's what I mentioned in my previous post, but you have quoted the last part of my post. Anyways, The whole bounty campaign is all about shilling their project. They hiring bounty hunters to spam all over social media to get paid, and those projects are paying for that. The bounty managers only manage the campaigns. Most altcoin campaigns scam their participants as they don't escrow the funds. Some of them pay, and some of them don't.
